companions.name: Stalin
companions.upgradetext:
This action will cost 300,000 or 30

Stalin will be upgraded to Uncommon quality, gain a 10% rating bonus, and have a max rank of 20.

A companion's Rank is a factor in its ratings, powers, runestone slots, item slots, and skins available.

questslots.name: Underground Storehouse
questslots.description: A bounty remains open on anyone who can stop the raiders plaguing this location.

questslots.name: Bandit Campground
questslots.description: Originally a royal burial site, bandits have since moved in and claimed it as their own.

questslots.name: Frozen Forest
questslots.description: Murgal Mawcram, and other creatures adapted to the ice and snow, hide amongst the snow-covered rocks and trees.

questslots.name: Misty Mines
questslots.description: A dark queen is believed to have taken up residence in this magical place.

questslots.name: The Feywild
questslots.description: Teeming with redcaps like Grimak Nailbiter, the feywild is not a place to be entered lightly.

questslots.name: Dungeon of Horrors (Epic)
questslots.description: The grotesque fomorian king Malabog is known to visit this location on a regular basis.

questslots.name: The Temple of Reflection
questslots.description:
Visit this temple to extend the life of your collection of Celestial Coins.

Upon completion of this adventure, the timer on your Celestial Coins will be extended, slowing their disappearance. They will still vanish if you do not invoke within Neverwinter or repeat the Temple of Reflection again within 30 hours.

You must invoke within Neverwinter to receive rewards.

quest.name: Haunted Forest
quest.description: The undead plague the woods. A hero is needed to brave the wilds and defeat the skeletal archer known as Deadeye.

def.name: Decrepit Skeleton Soldier
def.description: The weight of the monster's gear proved to be more of a liability than a benefit.

def.name: Deadeye
def.description: You're not sure if Deadeye is practicing for a battle, or if nocking an arrow is all he remembers how to do.

def.name: Skeleton Hound
def.description: The skeletal hound sits at the feet of an undead archer, perhaps master and pet in another life.

def.name: Skeleton Ambush
def.description: A wall slides away, revealing a row of skeletal archers, bows at the ready!

quest.goal: Send Deadeye back to his eternal rest.

def.name: Skeleton Hound
def.description: The skeletal hound sits at the feet of an undead archer, perhaps master and pet in another life.

activities.name: Lliira's Fireworks
activities.description: All tier 1 through tier 6 challenges within Sword Coast Adventures have a chance to give out  Professional Fireworks for Lliira's Night!
